isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: MIDLAND MODELS EL-1300 AND EL-1600 - CLEAN, INSPECT AND REPAIR

caution.para: Do not use solvents containing chemicals that will cause damage to aluminum alloy components. Never use gasoline, fuel oil or kerosene as a cleaning solvent.

svcsubsecinfo.para: Clean all parts thoroughly in clean solvent. Make sure all carbon deposits are removed from pistons and cylinder head. Be sure all drilled oil passages in crankshaft are open. Clean all carbon from piston ring grooves in piston. Be sure that all coolant passages are free and clean. Use compressed air to dry component and blow out all passage holes.

note.para: If any of the components are not within the specified limits as noted in SPECIFICATIONS , that component must be replaced.

svcproc.title: CYLINDER HEAD
svcproc.para: For cylinder head removal and disassembly refer to CYLINDER HEAD.
